alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Dunn; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:32AM CST until March 01 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SNOW EXPECTED TO IMPACT TRAVEL THIS MORNING... .A band of snow will overspread much of the region this morning. Areas to the north near Alexandria, Little Falls, and Mora MN could see 4 to 6 inches. Areas to the south near Willmar, the Twin Cities, and Eau Claire can expect around an inch. This will lead to slick roads for the Wednesday morning commute. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Quick burst of snow with snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and east central Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions for the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
